text:
Survivors and Whistleblowers

Several individuals have come forward as survivors or whistleblowers of the

MKUltra project. These individuals have shared their experiences and helped

to shed light on the dark history of the CIA's secret research program.

   • John Marks: An American journalist who wrote about the MKUltra

    project in his book "The Search for the Manchurian Candidate." His work

    helped to expose the truth about the CIA's secret research program.
